nodes.text: Religion can create a positive impact on society
Through religion promotion of social and moral values.
The rules that religion imposes are not always moral
But Religion set of rules and guidance may not always be perceived as moral by all.
Different religions follow different moral rules
These moral rules can sometimes conflict and promote dissension

messages.text: Religion can create a positive impact on society through its promotion of social and moral values.
